entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -42.7°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
